def extract_names(full_name):
    words = full_name.split()
    first_name = words[1]
    last_name = words[-1]
    first_name = first_name.capitalize()
    last_name = last_name.lower()
    return (first_name, last_name)

    words = full_name.split()
    first_name = words[-1]
    last_name = words[-1]
    first_name = first_name.capitalize()
    last_name = last_name.lower()
    return (first_name, last_name)
